Name: SECOND WORLD
About the game: In Second World, you have to take on the role of a little demon who needs to get out of the lost world and return home. During the passage of the game you have to interact with various objects in order to pass this or that obstacle, be it climb to the top or simply overcome the trap. Second World is a 2D platform game with puzzle elements.

Meta Description: Looking for information on SECOND WORLD? Check out the release date (Mar 8, 2022), developer insights from Max Pedro, and a complete game summary.
